item.title: Web File Browser
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "Web File Browser is a simple open-source file browser written in PHP (1 single file) that allows users to create, delete, edit, copy, rename, move and upload files and directories thru a light, full-text, web-based interface" Information here!
item.excerpt:encoded: "Web File Browser is a simple open-source file browser written in PHP (1 single file) that allows users to create, delete, edit, copy, rename, move and upload files and directories thru a light, full-text, web-based interface" Information here!
